post.content:
A few facts I found while riding bicycle
- There are no flat roads Like our lives there are no stable conditions. It is up or down. It is never flat.
- If there are flat roads all the way, it is not fun to ride Just like our lives it could be boring without surprises and challenges
- I enjoy riding. I even surprise myself I didn't think I am bicycle person. But I am. Everyone could be one. Life is like a box of chocolate. You never know until you try them
- I even enjoy uphill. It provides me the challenges. It gives me the opportunity to response. . When I am climbing I do not look beyond then where I am going. When task is too to handle brake it to smaller pieces. So it is easier to handle
- Joon Ho Lee is very athletic He rides like pro and fixes bike like pro
- There are no limits unless brain sets the limit Last Monday I rode from my home to Erindale park. Easily it could be 15 to 20 km away from my home. I had the notion that kind of long distance is for special people not person like me. I did it. Because I broke my own limitation wall down.
- It is fun and easier when you do it as the group. I could not do it alone. I had encouragement and support from Jennifer Kang and Joon Ho Lee
- Preparation helps I've been riding the bike for some time like 3 to 4 weeks. It was not long ride but I did it everyday.
- Experience helps. Success brings bigger success Now I can do more. I want to go Milton with my bike soon.
- Know your tool/HW I am riding my daughter's bike for now. I tried Jennifer's. It made difference from night to day. I am going to buy my own bike today.
Thanks Jennifer and Joon Ho. I love you guys and peace
post.title: Thomas Lee and Riding Bicycle :Believe it or not
